title: A Twist in the Story
description: After living a horrid past full of torment and depression, Adelaide Cooper ended up on the streets of D.C., letting herself get sucked into the world of drugs and alcohol, in fear that nothing would get better.One unusual day a stranger decided to give her a chance. There was just something about Nathan Ashbyâ€™s charming smile and welcoming attitude that let Adelaide trust him.What started as a simple act of kindness soon turned into a romance that neither one of them would forget.
author: Sophia Olson
